byline.contributor: Ashley Parker reported from Philadelphia, and Matthew Rosenberg from Washington. Alan Rappeport contributed reporting from Washington.
byline.original: By ASHLEY PARKER and MATTHEW ROSENBERG

abstract: Donald Trump, in speech to Union League of Philadelphia, vows to significantly expand American military forces; promise comes day after Trump released endorsement letter from about 90 retired military officials; budget analysts say his plan to fund such an expansion is unrealistic.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: In a speech at the Union League of Philadelphia, Mr. Trump called for an end to the military spending sequester and contrasted his views with those of Hillary Clinton.
snippet: In a speech at the Union League of Philadelphia, Mr. Trump called for an end to the military spending sequester and contrasted his views with those of Hillary Clinton....

headline.main: Donald Trump Vows to Bolster Nation’s Military Capacities
headline.print_headline: Trump Proposes Vast Expansion Of U.S. Military
